#labels Featured
[http://www.mathcs.emory.edu/hide/ HIDE] is a framework for de-identifying unstructured data. The main application of this software is for de-identifying medical data for medical data publishing.

HIDE is a [http://www.djangoproject.com/ Django] application using a [http://couchdb.apache.org/ CouchDB] document store. Here are the [Installation installation instructions].

HIDE is currently under development by [http://www.mathcs.emory.edu/~jgardn3 James Gardner] under the direction of [http://www.mathcs.emory.edu/~lxiong/ Li Xiong] at [http://www.emory.edu Emory University].
